sen.j: 久我 堯通（こが たかみち、慶長13年（1608年） - 寛永19年3月18日 (旧暦)（1642年4月17日））は、江戸時代前期の廷臣。
sen.e: Takamichi KOGA (1608 - April 17, 1642) was a retainer of Imperial Court in the early Edo period.
Takamichi KOGA (1608 - April 17, 1642) was a retainer of Imperial Court during the early Edo period.
Takamichi KOGA (1608 - April 17, 1642) was a retainer of Imperial Court during the early Edo period.
He was ranked at Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Sakone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards.)
He was ranked at Shogoinoge (Senior 5th Rank, Lower Grade) Sakone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards.)
He was ranked at Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Sakone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置移動用語統一
Yahoo!辞書に「某氏」は「ある人。名前が不明な場合や名前をふせる場合などに用いる。」とあることから、「母は某氏。」は「母は不明である。」と解釈して訳出しました。

sen.j: 養子に久我広通がいる。
sen.e: His adopted child was Hiromichi KOGA.
His adopted child was Hiromichi KOGA.
His adopted child was Hiromichi KOGA.
